% https://q.uiver.app/#
\[\begin{tikzcd}
	{\Gamma.A} \\
	\\
	{\Gamma.A.B} && {\Gamma.A.(\Pi_{A}B)}
	\arrow["{\app_{A,B}}"{description}, from=3-3, to=3-1]
	\arrow["{p_{B}}", from=3-1, to=1-1]
	\arrow["{p_{\Pi_{A}B}}"', from=3-3, to=1-1]
	\arrow["{(p_{\Pi_{A}B},q_{B}[\app_{A,B}])}", curve={height=-24pt}, dashed, from=3-3, to=3-1]
\end{tikzcd}\]
